changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.createView: select a.id,m.id as equipment_type_id,m.equipment_type,e.equipment_code ||'.'||a.area_code as position,a.freeze_frame_number, (select count( DISTINCT s.id) from support_rack s left join frozen_box box on box.support_rack_id = s.id where s.area_id = a.id and s.status!='0000' and box.status in ('2004','2006')) as count_of_used, (select count(s.id) from support_rack s where s.area_id = a.id and s.status!='0000') as count_of_shelves, ((select count(s.id) from support_rack s where s.area_id = a.id and s.status!='0000')-(select count( DISTINCT s.id) from support_rack s left join frozen_box box on box.support_rack_id = s.id where s.area_id = a.id and s.status!='0000' and box.status in ('2004','2006')) )as count_of_rest, a.status, a.equipment_id,e.equipment_code,a.area_code from area a left join equipment e on a.equipment_id = e.id left join equipment_modle m on e.equipment_modle_id = m.id where a.status !='0000'
